featured.text: Moran’s watercolors—the first color renderings of the area—as well as Jackson’s photos and the survey results were presented to the Congress.

definition.zh_def: 渲染；呈現，特別是在計算機圖形學中將三維模型轉換為二維圖像的過程。
definition.en_def: The process of generating an image from a model, especially in computer graphics, where a three-dimensional representation is converted into a two-dimensional image.
definition.example: The artist spent hours rendering the final scene of the animation.
